Package: org.ar4k.secure

[Groovy] Class SpringSecurityOAuthController

    • org.ar4k.secure.SpringSecurityOAuthController

    • Gestisce l'autenticazioni OAuth (Facebook,Google,LinkedIn,Twitter)

      • Property Detail

        • java.lang.Object askToLinkOrCreateAccount

        • java.lang.Object createAccount

        • java.lang.Object grailsApplication

        • java.lang.Object linkAccount

          Associates an OAuthID with an existing account. Needs the user's password to ensure that the user owns that account, and authenticates to verify before linking.

        • java.lang.Object oauthService

        • java.lang.Object onFailure

        • java.lang.Object onSuccess

          This can be used as a callback for a successful OAuth authentication attempt. It logs the associated user in if he or she has an internal Spring Security account and redirects to targetUri (provided as a URL parameter or in the session). Otherwise it redirects to a URL for linking OAuth identities to Spring Security accounts. The application must implement the page and provide the associated URL via the oauth.registration.askToLinkOrCreateAccountUri configuration setting.

        • java.lang.Object springSecurityService
